comment: It's a very good app. The features probably work well. Customization is easy and intuitive. It's a little hard to figure out how save, share and transfer, but with a little work, everything turns out fine. ONLY, I can't transfer from my phone to my watch. I'm pretty sure I'm doing everything right, but I just can't transfer the face I just customized to my watch. Doesn't matter how many different times I try, nothing appears on my "user presets" face.

author: Mick Leggett
comment: Really like the face and very, very configurable.  One downside is that the digital clock on the ambient face didn't update when changing time zones, the primary analogue face did.  Selected an alternative face, then back to this one to correct it.  Minor bug?

author: Marty Kinnamon
comment: Wow! This is a really nice Android Wear watchface. There are a lot of watchfaces for AW, but I believe this one is the best. It's even better than Weareal. The quality and options are amazing.

author: Carolyn Smith
comment: Not very user friendly -- cannot get it to sync to my Ticwatch.  Incompatibility issues would have been nice to know about before I purchased it. :(

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Hi, this is an Android Wear watchface (the classification is in Play Store). It's not compatible with watches running other operating systems. Please get in touch on ultimate.watch@stefanowatches.com and we can arrange a refund.

author: Jim Thibault
comment: The weather is not updating. Currently it is minus 1 and the weather says 9c. I checked it was last updated 3PM yesterday afternoon, it is supposed to update every two hours. I can not count on the Weather for me it will be better to go another watch face that does work. Seems to change but it is real slow at changing, can not rely too much on what it says.  This is stock weather "weather complication I tried did not work well",  maybe see if I can find a better weather complication.

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Please get in touch on ultimate.watch@stefanowatches.com and we can try and resolve the reason for no update.

author: Milagerdi
comment: The most professional customizable/ configurable watch face ever. The developer(s) put a good amount of effort. Simply love it. Now if I may suggest an updtae/ upgrade ( which I'll gladly pay for it ) will be to add a rectangle boxes for digital time viewing ( something like aviator version of breitling ) that will cover a lot .  Thanks again for such an amazing watch face .

author: Javier Iglesias
comment: I'm impressed with all the futures and settings with this app. Initially I had issues with the settings due to not uploading the app on my watch.

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Please get in touch on ultimate.watch@stefanowatches.com and we can sort out what could be wrong.

author: kyle oden
comment: Must have 5 star app. This app is awesome. Very easy to use and understand with great results. I wish it supported gear 3, maybe in the future or with a separate app . I would pay again for this app to work with gear 3.

author: Javier Chang
comment: Excelente watchface.  Worth its name...Ultimate !. Great presets. No issues with Huawei smartwatch 1.. costumize until your heart content

author: Nate King
comment: Great watch face - very customizable!

author: John Pendarvis
comment: I have to say I purchased this just a few minutes ago and I am seriously impressed by your app.

author: Cameron Grant
comment: Easily the best dollar I've spent on a watch app

author: Raj Narasimhan
comment: Simple and elegant. Total customizations is the selling point.

author: Kristen H
comment: It was working but I went to change my watch face today and it won't sync.  It alsuo blew out my old watch face.  I restarted my watch but no luck. I uninstalled and reinstalled but no change.  Doesn't work. It finally installed to the watch and I can sync faces again.  It must've uninstalled itself somehow, which isn't cool.

author: Rich Harris
comment: Great was just what I looking for! One thing though, I like to have my ambient mode the same as when I tap on the watch but just a little dimmer and not a different colour background, any way of doing this?

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Yes, in the phone companion app, go to the Content settings tab and the Advanced section. Just check the Use full ambient display checkbox.

author: Steve Palmero
comment: Extremely customizable, very nice looking face. The only thing keeping it from 5 stars is that on my LG Watch Sport, the face doesn't fill the entire display, instead leaving a small black border.

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Thanks. Please get in touch on ultimate.watch@stefanowatches.com and we can have a look at the reason. There shouldn't be any border.

author: Sheldon Huelin
comment: Great features especially for the outdoors folk, the barometer and altimeter are awesome additions to a watch face.

author: Ken O'Keefe
comment: Is it possible to have GMT/Zulu time added to timezones?

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: GMT is unfortunately not part of the time zone list from Android. But there is an easy workaround: Set the time zone to Atlantic/Azores. Then just change the label on the time zone in the watch app to "UTC" or "GMT".

author: Paul Jablonski
comment: Very nice!

author: Joseph Rubin
comment: This is it! This is the watch face app I've been looking for!! My search is over! Ok... Let me explain. My primary watch face is the Bubble cloud app, that app is way more than just a face, it's a app launcher, watch face, and way way more. But I've always searched for secondary faces, for when I want just a good looking face. I settled on Pujie Black, I had some nice faces from them. But still... I was always still searching for elegant, real looking watch faces. This app hit the nail on the head! These faces look stunning, and they look like actual real watches. I have now the Zenwatch 3 in black. So the black and gold faces from this app look like my watch came with it. It looks made for my watch. Looks....prefect! I wish I could attach a screenshot image here, but I see no option here to do that. Oh well. Treasure my word for it, it looks really good. Thanks for the great work guys

author: Jason Ferrari
comment: This application is fantastic. The watch faces are beautiful and the customization and functionality are equally great. I especially love the altimeter complication.  I was a little intimidated by the customization interface at first but after a few minutes it was easy to figure out. I even sent the developer a question that was promptly and thoroughly answered. Again, I am very impressed.  This was definitely money well spent and I highly recommend this app.

author: Who Dun
comment: Great app, great communication - the issue I had I'm not sure why it happened but this seemed to fix it if anyone ever gets the problem - essentially swap to a different watch face (possibly even a watch reboot fixes this) - this retriggers the app to ask for permissions - I had authorized the heart rate permission but not the weather permission, unsure how that could affect the heart rate but again must have been some odd hiccup that once I restarted the watch face it asked again and I hit check then went in and enabled HRM and it is now working! Truly a great app and I appreciate the quick feedback from the developer even though I ended up figuring out the problem as I was sending them an email! (this was when I  re-opened the watch face, it asked for the weather permission and I accepted and the Heart Rate feature started to work)

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content:
Hello, please get in touch on 
ultimate.watch@stefanowatches.com and we can figure out what the reason for this might be.

author: Kieran Lewis
comment: Good app that lets you add in complications.   Would be nice to have a higher level of customisation rather than just style and colour. I'm also a big fan of being able to see the mechanisms, so would be nice to have that as an option for a face

author: Andrew Morgan
comment: £0.79 for this?  It's worth a lot more!  Great app, so many choices! Hard to stop tinkering!  Thanks dev ... great work 😀

author: O. Keith Jones
comment: Love the customization options! Finally got a watch face set up just like I want. And it is really pretty as well as functional. Now if someone could write a decent in-call management AW app that really works my Pebble replacement would be complete.

author: Shyam subu parmeswaran
comment: I have never been as impressed by an app. There are a ton of customization features. I finally got the watch face I wanted.

author: Zoltan Kis
comment: A full 5 stars. Beautiful, customizable, supports everything I need and beyond. Best buy, and so far the best watchface regardless of price.

author: Travis Brendelson
comment: When I set a custom background image it shows then changes back to a standard background any fix for this?

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Please get in touch on ultimate.watch@stefanowatches.com and we can try and figure out the reason.

author: Dan Muntz
comment: Can't find a way to move the unread message indicator that's at the 2 o'clock position. When I read a message or dismiss one, that indicator still shows until I read on my phone. It's also right over a dial I have.

author: Douglas Fils
comment: Simply the best.   It ruined all other apps for me.

author: Simon Hilton
comment: Doesn't work with Google Fit 2 watch so requesting a refund otherwise looks amazing!

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: As discussed in separate email this review was referring to the Samsung Gear Fit 2 fitness band which runs Samsung's proprietary Tizen operating system. This is an Android Wear watch face and will only work on Android Wear watches.

author: Kyle O'Donnell
comment: Beautiful minimal and functional that doesn't rip up your battery like other faces!

author: Sergiy M.
comment: The best looking, functional, and customizable watch faces I've used so far.

author: jj martin
comment: Best I've found so far

author: Brad Stuart
comment: Everything I am looking for in a watchface. Excellent customization and options. Thanks dev!

author: Matti White
comment: Brilliant watchface for AW2! Really nice design and great presets to play with!

author: Mauro Casag
comment: Great

author: Wissam M. Khoury
comment: This is the second best watchface for me. Although it is a bit complicated with all the user setups which I didn't master yet, however I thunk it is missing one major functionality which is the ability to assign shortcuts anywhere else than the dials. Im the developer will add soon as I see him active in responses and updates.

reply.author: Stefano Watches
reply.content: Thanks. You can actually assign shortcuts also to "empty" dial positions. If you f.e. use a 4 dial fixed layout (in the dial config menu) but only use the 6 and 9 o'clock positions (dial 1 and 2) you can still assign shortcuts to the empty 12 and 3 o'clock positions. There is also an active G+ community for sharing info,presets,questions on UW2.

author: Jim Gentile
comment: Wow!  This app is amazing, not only in the broad variety of watch faces it offers, but in the vast number of configurations and complications it employs.  Most other apps offer far less for considerably more money.  In addition, I had a few questions about some of the features, and received incredible technical support from Stefan.  He was very persistent in helping me understand the best way to accomplish what I was trying to do.  I'd give this app 10 stars if I could.  Buy it Today!!

author: Joe Newman
comment: Really love this watch face because of the configurable dials with shortcuts for each.  The one improvement I wish there was an option for would be making the dial information dominant in the display so that the hands do not obscure the reading of the information.
